content: this is the ad-free pdf version of the pattern for the free version please visit my blog http //hearthookhome com/an-egg-cellent-apron-free-egg-gathering-apron-crochet-pattern/ for this egg-cellent egg gathering apron we will create a back/main portion three strips that we will use for pockets one large pocket is placed last for your cell phone to-do list pen whatever then we will add a strap doubled-up for added durability harvest up to nineteen eggs in your egg gathering apron each morning
